meanings.definition: The quality or state of being malicious.
meanings.sent1: Her maliciousnesses were evident in the way she spread rumors about her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The maliciousnesses of the bully were finally exposed when the truth came out.
meanings.sent3: Despite her maliciousnesses, she always had a smile on her face.
meanings.sent4: The dark cloud of his maliciousnesses hung over the peaceful town.
meanings.sent5: The teacher warned the students about the dangers of maliciousnesses in their actions.

meanings.definition: The intention or desire to do harm or cause suffering to others.
meanings.sent1: The group was shocked by the level of maliciousnesses in his actions.
meanings.sent2: The maliciousnesses in her eyes were a clear indication of her ill intentions.
meanings.sent3: His maliciousnesses seemed to vanish when he saw the puppy wagging its tail.
meanings.sent4: The maliciousnesses in his words cut deeper than any physical harm.
meanings.sent5: The story highlighted the consequences of unchecked maliciousnesses towards others.
